abstract: New York Jets say emergence of rookie wide receiver Jeremy Kerley, coupled with Derrick Mason's poor performance, led to Mason being traded to Houston Texans.
snippet: In five games with the Jets, Derrick Mason had hauled in 13 passes for 115 yards, which is far off his past production.
lead_paragraph: In five games with the Jets, Derrick Mason had hauled in 13 passes for 115 yards, which is far off his past production.

headline.main: Rookie Receiver’s Emergence and Mason’s Performance Led to Trade, Jets Say
headline.print_headline: Rookie Receiver’s Emergence and Mason’s Performance Led to Trade, Jets Say
